name: Sanity (Raw Egg Studio)
description:
A story based, action game, about a Veteran who lost his mind...

He sits alone on the table, with whiskey as his only friend. So drunk he can barely move. 

And the inebriation makes his thoughts a little too scary; a little too real...

He can't control his thoughts. He can't control his body. Will he be able to control his Sanity?...
